description: Akudai Kanzaburo is an arms dealer who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.
Agotogi was the leader of a gang of bandits who tried to kidnap Vivi about 11 years before the princess's return to Arabasta.
Acilia is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who participated in a tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Aggie 68 is a member of the Spade Pirates.
Ally is a little girl who was being held captive in the Biscuit Room, on Punk Hazard. She was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
Akehende is a Marine Rear Admiral.
Ahho Zurako is a noble from the Goa Kingdom and the daughter of Ahho Desunen IX.
Atagoyama is a sumo wrestler in Wano Country's Bakura Town.
Azuki is an old woman who lives in Ebisu Town.
Ahho Desunen IX is a noble from the Goa Kingdom and the father of Ahho Zurako.
Agyo is a fighting lion (闘獅子, Tōjishi?) and a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Alpha is a member of the CP8 branch of Cipher Pol.
Asahija is a Marine Chief Petty Officer whose shadow was once stolen by Gecko Moria.
Ahiru is the deputy commander of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Belo Betty.

affiliations: Ideo Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Abdullah is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner Jeet. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.
Anjo is a pirate admirer. He witnessed Gol D. Roger's execution. He has a tattoo of a plain Jolly Roger on his right arm.
Aswa is Koza's mother and Toto's wife.

Akumai was a Billions agent who followed Mr. 2 Bon Kurei everywhere before he was captured by Hina when Mr. 2 and his crew sacrificed themselves to save the Straw Hat Pirates. His current fate is unknown.

english_name: A.O. (VIZ Media and FUNimation subs); A.O (FUNimation dub)
affiliations: A O Pirates; Subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates
description: A O is an infamous New World pirate and captain of the A O Pirates. He and his crew were subordinates to Whitebeard.
Amadob is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
Aruyutayan V was the king of Lvneel Kingdom roughly 400 years ago when Mont Blanc Noland discovered Shandora.
Banchi is a giant "all-terrain" turtle used by Baroque Works—particularly Miss All-Sunday—for transportation. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".
The Basilisk is the second-in-command of Impel Down's Level 2: Beast Hell, under the Sphinx.
Banchina was Usopp's mother and Yasopp's wife. She died of sickness when Usopp was still young.
Batchee is a fly that Fullbody put in his soup to try to humiliate Sanji.

Ankoro is a gigantic anglerfish formerly under the command of captain Vander Decken IX, residing in the Underworld of the Sea, seven thousand meters underneath the ocean surface. Wadatsumi seems to regard Ankoro as a pet, as apparently Ankoro was told "not to eat ships" before.
Andre is a New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard. He is the twin brother of the Marine officer Candre.
Alpacaman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mines of the Udon Region of Wano Country.
Atlas, also designated as Punk-05 (PUNK-05パンク ファイブ, Panku-Faibu?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "violence".
Babanuki is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as the warden of the Prisoner Mine in Udon, a region of Wano Country. After the prison takeover, Babanuki was tamed by Tama.
Bacura is a black panther owned by the Kuja Pirates under Boa Hancock.
Beer VI is the king of the Roshwan Kingdom.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom Scouting Unit; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Baxcon is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.

Aramaki, better known by his alias Ryokugyu, is an Admiral in the Marines. He was conscripted through a World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip, being appointed to his rank (next to Fujitora) to fill the two Admiral vacancies caused by Kuzan's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion.

birthday: Bas: March 30th And: March 31st Kerville: April 1st
blood_type: Bas: X And: XF Kerville: F
description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, "he" is actually three men—Bas, And, and Kerville—who are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.

affiliations: Mt. Atama Thieves; Kozuki Family; Nine Red Scabbards
description: Ashura Doji was a former bandit, a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. After Oden's death, he returned to being a criminal under the name Shutenmaru, assuming leadership of the Mt. Atama Thieves. He initially severed his ties with the Kozuki Family in the present but rejoined after witnessing Yasuie's death.

Aisa is a young Shandia girl who used to sneak onto the Upper Yard frequently to collect Vearth. She is Isa's daughter. After the timeskip, she works in the Wagomuland theme park and sells Cloud Balloons.
Batman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

Aladine is a goatsbeard brotula merman. He was originally a Ryugu Kingdom soldier who was then enslaved, but then became a pirate as the doctor and later first mate of the Sun Pirates. He is the husband of Charlotte Praline, serving as the bond between the Sun Pirates and the Charlotte Family.
"Shark Cutter" Bastille is a Marine Vice Admiral who took part in the Summit War of Marineford. He later appeared in Dressrosa under the command of Admiral Fujitora.
Bankuro was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

Absalom of the Graveyard was the leader of the Zombie Soldiers and Zombie Generals of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. He was one of the Mysterious Four of the Thriller Bark Pirates and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga.
"Water Buffalo" Atmos is the former 13th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

affiliations: Happo Navy; Chinjao Family; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Donquixote Pirates (defected)
description: Baby 5 is a pirate and the wife of Sai, the Happo Navy's 13th leader. She is a former servant and assassin of the Donquixote Pirates, serving as an officer in the Pica Army. Her real name has not been revealed, as "Baby 5" is a codename given to her upon joining the Donquixote Pirates.
"Catcher-Killing" Babe, better known by his alias Mr. 4, is a former officer agent of the Baroque Works and partner of Miss Merry Christmas. He is also Lassoo's owner.

affiliations: Barto Club; his own Mafia Family (former); Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Bartolomeo the Cannibal is a Super Rookie, the captain of the Barto Club and the captain of the second ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi at the Corrida Colosseum, where he met Monkey D. Luffy and pledged his loyalty towards him after winning the B Block.
Bekori is the former king of the Sorbet Kingdom.

affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy's Delivery, Buggy and Alvida Alliance; Buggy Pirates (Acting Captain, temporarily); Alvida Pirates (formerly)
description: "Iron Mace" Alvida is the former captain of the Alvida Pirates and the first antagonist encountered by Luffy on his journey after going to sea. Due to her actions, she can be regarded as the secondary antagonist of the Romance Dawn Arc and the tertiary antagonist of the Loguetown Arc.

japanese_name: エーエスエ・ムアール
description: Ayesé Mar is an okaki artisan from the western part of South Blue.
Banshee is a mermaid and was the only female member of the Spade Pirates.
Bakezo is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
Banzaburo was a samurai of Wano Country who worked as a servant to the Kozuki Family until their fall 20 years ago.
Belladonna is one of the Kuja of Amazon Lily, and the doctor of the island.

Avalo Pizarro, also known as the "Corrupt King", was one of the criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious, he had to effectively be erased from history. Prior to his life of crime, he was once a king of a North Blue kingdom that overthrew him for his despotic ways. He has since been freed by Marshall D. Teach and has become a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
Bellett was the prince of an unnamed kingdom who became a pirate and was consequently imprisoned in Impel Down, and whose gender was unwillingly inverted.
Bariete is a monkey mink who is a member of the Recon Squad (偵察隊, Teisatsu-tai?), and the one in charge of guarding the gates of the Mokomo Dukedom.

Bao Huang is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the crew's surveillance division, the "Marys". She appears to have the duty of keeping and presenting daily schedules for the crew and their captain Kaidou.
Barry is a member of the Spade Pirates.
Belo Betty is the current commander of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army following the death of the previous commander, Ginny.
Biyo is a child who was held captive on Punk Hazard by Caesar Clown. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
Blumarine was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
Blackback, also known by his initials BB, is a gorilla mink and a Guardian of the Whale Forest.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Straw Hat Grand Fleet (Tontatta Pirates)
description: Bobomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit. He is the younger brother of Bomba.
Bogard is a Marine Headquarters officer and the right hand man of Vice Admiral Monkey D. Garp.
"Sweeper" Bobbin is a bishop-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Bian is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who serves as the leader of the Pink Bee Squad and a member of the Tontatta Pirates.
devil_fruit_name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi

affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)
description: Bishamon is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
Bizarre is an infamous New World pirate captain who was allied with Whitebeard.

affiliations: Arlong Pirates; Sun Pirates (former); Impel Down (former)
description: Arlong the Saw is a sawshark fish-man. He was the captain of the all fish-man crew (excluding Nami), the Arlong Pirates, a former member of the Sun Pirates, and the older half-brother of Madam Shyarly. He is also a major inspirational figure for the New Fish-Man Pirates.
Boogie is a member of the Kid Pirates.
Blueno is an agent of CP0.
Blondie is an infamous New World pirate who was allied with Whitebeard.
Blamenco is the former 6th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

japanese_name: ボア・サンダーソニア
description: Boa Sandersonia is the younger sister of Boa Hancock, the ruler of Amazon Lily. She is also one of the second-in commands of the Kuja Pirates and the older sister of Boa Marigold. She and her sisters are referred to by the Kuja as the Gorgon Sisters.
devil_fruit_name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda

description: Adele is a mermaid and an employee at the Mermaid Café.

Camie is a kissing gourami mermaid that first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. She first appeared in the main series after being spat out of a large sea boar that was saved by Hatchan, along with her starfish pet and master, Pappag. While dreaming of becoming a designer, she worked on Hatchan's Takoyaki 8 when she first met the Straw Hat Pirates. After the timeskip, she is a waitress at the Mermaid Cafe on Fish-Man Island.

japanese_name: ボア・マリーゴールド
description: Boa Marigold is the younger sister of Boa Hancock, the ruler of Amazon Lily. She is also one of the second-in commands of the Kuja Pirates and the younger sister of Boa Sandersonia. She and her sisters are referred to by the Kuja as the Gorgon Sisters.
devil_fruit_name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra

description: Caimanlady is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the surveillance division called the "Marys".
Black Maria is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. She owns her own brothel on Onigashima near Kaidou's castle.
devil_fruit_name: Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli

description: Antonio is the owner of "Antonio's Graman" in Sabaody Archipelago.
"Rope-Tugging" Chappe is an ex-prisoner who was a henchman for Caesar Clown. He was first seen fighting against the Marines of G-5 on Punk Hazard.

Amazon was the elderly gatekeeper of Skypiea and informer at the entrance to Skypiea known as Heaven's Gate. She let people in even if they could not pay her extol toll, but purposely failed to tell those who did not pay about the consequences for entering the city.

affiliations: Ideo Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Blue Gilly is a martial artist from the Longleg Tribe. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he became part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet when he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.
Cancer is a Marine vice admiral.
Bongo is a former lumber dealer who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital, but was exiled after being swindled by Komurasaki.
Blenheim is the former 9th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
Bonk Punch is one of the Senior Officers and musicians of the Red Hair Pirates.

Bell-mère was a former Marine and the adoptive mother of Nami and Nojiko, introduced in a flashback during the Arlong Park Arc. She raised the two girls for approximately nine years until she was murdered by Arlong.

Basil Hawkins is an infamous pirate from North Blue known as the "Magician" and the captain of the Hawkins Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". His previous known bounty amounted to 249,000,000, but after the timeskip, it was raised to 320,000,000. After encountering Kaidou, he joined the Beasts Pirates and became one of the crew's Shinuchi.

Stealth Black is a fictional member of Germa 66 portrayed in the comic strip Sora, Warrior of the Sea. His character was likely based on a Raid Suit created by the Vinsmoke Family that was later given to their estranged third son, Sanji.

"Maelstrom Spider" Squard is an infamous New World pirate and the captain of the Maelstrom Spider Pirates. Squard and his crew were allies of the Whitebeard Pirates and participated in the Summit War of Marineford.
Lieutenant Junior Grade Stalker is a Marine on Vice Admiral Momonga's ship.

japanese_name: ギョロ, ニン, バオ
description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.

Stefan is Whitebeard's dog. It is a character invented by Oda when a fan asked him in an SBS if Whitebeard's mustache could be used as a boomerang. Oda answered that Whitebeard probably did whenever he took his dog, Stefan, for a walk.

english_name: Brandnew (FUNimation and Crunchyroll Simulcast; Formerly Viz); Brannew (Current Viz Manga)
description: Commodore Brannew is a Marine officer stationed at Marine Headquarters who assigns bounties to criminals. He was first introduced as a lieutenant commander during the Loguetown Arc, but was promoted to commodore during the timeskip.

japanese_name: シャーロット・マルニエ
description: Charlotte Marnier is the 13th daughter and 32nd child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin sister of Mozart. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Yeast (酵母大臣, Kōbo Daijin?), governing over Kibo Island.
Boodle is the mayor of Orange Town. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Orange Town Arc.

japanese_name: シャーロット・マーブル
description: Charlotte Marble is the 24th daughter and 55th child of the Charlotte Family, the second quadruplet sister of Mobile, Myukuru, and Maple, and a Longarm-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Cocoa Weed is a village located on Drum Island. It neighbors the village of Bighorn and is south of Gyasta.
Sterry is the king of Goa Kingdom and the husband of the queen, Sarie Nantokanette.

japanese_name: シャーロット・メリゼ
description: Charlotte Melise is the 17th daughter and 40th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

japanese_name: シャーロット・マッシュ
description: Charlotte Mash is the tenth daughter and 26th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet sister of Moscato and Cornstarch. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Briscola is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
Stroganoff is the king of Beef Kingdom (ビーフ王国, Bīfu Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
Brocca is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

japanese_name: シャーロット・モンブ
description: Charlotte Montb is the 29th son and 50th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest triplet brother of Kanten and Kato. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Brontosaurus was a dinosaur who lived on Little Garden.
Vice Admiral Strawberry is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call assault on Enies Lobby.

japanese_name: シャーロット・マスカルポーネ
description: Charlotte Mascarpone is the 34th son and 62nd child of the Charlotte Family, the older twin brother of Joscarpone, and a Snakeneck-human hybrid. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Tableware (食器大臣, Shokki Daijin?), governing over Cutlery Island.

japanese_name: シャーロット・モンデ
description: Charlotte Mondée is the second daughter and sixth child of the Charlotte Family, the eldest quadruplet sister of Amande, Hachée, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

japanese_name: シャーロット・モービル
description: Charlotte Mobile is the 31st son and 54th child of the Charlotte Family, the elder quadruplet brother of Marble, Myukuru, and Maple, and a Longarm-human hybrid. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Tasting (味見大臣, Ajimi Daijin?), governing over Futoru Island.

english_name: Kicking Claw Force; Elite Alabastian Royal Guards
description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.
Bingo is a former priest and cooper who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital before losing all his money and being exiled.

japanese_name: シャーロット・モスカート
description: Charlotte Moscato is the 16th son and 25th child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Mash and Cornstarch. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Gelato (ジェラート大臣, Jerāto Daijin?), governing over Ice Island.

japanese_name: シャーロット・モーツアルト
description: Charlotte Mozart is the 12th daughter and 31st child of the Charlotte Family and the elder twin sister of Marnier. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

"Gourmet Knight" Streusen is the executive chef of the Big Mom Pirates, and is also the co-founder of the crew alongside Big Mom herself, having accompanied her even during her time at the Rocks Pirates. Prior to his current position, he was the chef of a pirate crew that has since fallen apart.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ノルマンド
description: Charlotte Normande is the 38th daughter and the 82nd child of the Charlotte Family. She is a hybrid between a human and a dwarf.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ヌガー
description: Charlotte Nougat is the 41st son and 75th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Bubblegum is a member of the Kid Pirates.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ノアゼット
description: Charlotte Noisette is the 15th son and 24th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Finance (大蔵大臣, Ōkura Daijin?), governing over Kinko Island.
Buche is a member of the WCI 31, serving as the head chef of the first kitchen.
Brogy the Red Ogre is a giant from Elbaf and one of the two captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Dorry. He was an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden Arc.
Bellamy the Hyena is the former captain of the Bellamy Pirates, and a former member of the Donquixote Pirates. After the Dressrosa Arc, he retired from piracy and became a dyer.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ミュークル
description: Charlotte Myukuru is the 25th daughter and 56th child of the Charlotte Family, the third quadruplet sister of Mobile, Marble, and Maple, and a longarm-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Bomba is a member of the Marines G-5 Branch Unit 01. He is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi.

japanese_name: シャーロット・モンドール
description: "Scribe" Charlotte Mont-d'Or is the 19th son and 30th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Cheese (チーズ大臣, Chīzu Daijin?), governing over Cheese Island.
Bobby Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Kelly Funk's younger brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

japanese_name: シャーロット・パンナ
description: Charlotte Panna is the 28th daughter and 61st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

japanese_name: シャーロット・オペラ
description: Charlotte Opera is the fifth son and the tenth child of the Charlotte Family and is the eldest quintuplet brother of Counter, Cadenza, Cabaletta, and Gala. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and served as Totto Land's Minister of Whipped Cream (生クリーム大臣, Nama Kurīmu Daijin?, Viz: "Minister of Cream"), governing over Noko Island. His current status is unknown after having his lifespan removed by a rampaging Big Mom.

affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)
description: Chome is a kunoichi and a member of the Beasts Pirates. She previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
Camel is Kuzan's super penguin.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ポワール
description: Charlotte Poire is the 19th daughter and the 43rd child of the Charlotte Family, the younger twin sister of Galette, and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Buchi is an officer of the Black Cat Pirates. Along with his partner Sham, he is also the protector of the crew's ship, the Bezan Black, and together they are known as the Nyaban Brothers (ニャーバン・兄弟ブラザーズ, Nyāban Burazāzu?).
Buhichuck was the boss of the "Surprise Zombies" in the dining room.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Bomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom. He is one of the two vice chiefs of the Tontatta Kingdom along with Rampo, under Gancho and Leo, and serves under Leo in the Tontatta Pirates. He is the elder brother of Bobomba.

japanese_name: シャーロット・プラリネ
description: Charlotte Praline is a half-human and half-hammerhead shark mermaid, the 21st daughter and 47th child of the Charlotte Family, and the younger twin sister of Prim. She was also Totto Land's former Minister of Design (デザイン大臣, Dezain Daijin?), having governed over Unique Island until her defection.

japanese_name: シャーロット・オーブン
description: Charlotte Oven is the fourth son and fifth child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet brother of Katakuri and Daifuku. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Browned Food (こんがり大臣, Kongari Daijin?, Viz: "Minister of Baking"), governing over Yakigashi Island.

japanese_name: シャーロット・プリム
description: Charlotte Prim is the 20th daughter and 46th child of the Charlotte Family, the older twin sister of Praline, and an octopus mermaid-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Bulldog is the king of the Sorbet Kingdom. He held the throne one generation before Bekori’s reign, and reclaimed his position after Bekori's successor Bartholomew Kuma became a fugitive.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ウエハース
description: Charlotte Wafers is the 37th daughter and the 79th child of the Charlotte Family.

japanese_name: シャーロット・サンマルク
description: Charlotte Saint-Marc is the 22nd son and the 38th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Essence (エッセンス大臣, Essensu Daijin?), governing over Flavor Island. He is the older twin brother of Basans.

japanese_name: シャーロット・レザン
description: Charlotte Raisin is the 33rd son and 60th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Big Mom's enraged army sent to fight Monkey D. Luffy, and later joined Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Luffy on Cacao Island.
Chuji is the pet rat of the geisha Some.

Buffalo is a combatant and an assassin of the Donquixote Pirates and an officer of the Pica Army. His real name is yet to be revealed, as "Buffalo" is a codename given to him upon joining the Donquixote Pirates.
Saint Charlos is a World Noble, the son of Saint Rosward, and the older brother of Saint Shalria.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ペロスペロー
description: Charlotte Perospero is the eldest child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Candy (キャンディ大臣, Kyandi Daijin?), governing over Candy Island.
Bungo is an arsonist in Wano Country who currently lives in Ebisu Town. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital, but was exiled after being swindled by Komurasaki.
Braham is one of the Shandia warriors who fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.
Bunbuku is a teapot owned by Tenguyama Hitetsu that was given life by "eating" the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki.
devil_fruit_name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki

japanese_name: シャーロット・ウィロ
description: Charlotte Wiro is the 43rd son and the 80th child of the Charlotte Family. He is a Human-Snakeneck hybrid.

japanese_name: シャーロット・タブレット
description: Charlotte Tablet is the 21st son and 34th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of High-Fat. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Toppings (トッピング大臣, Toppingu Daijin?), governing over Topping Island.
Chouchou is a dog from Orange Town, famed for his unceasing vigil over the pet-food shop founded by his deceased owner. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".

The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

japanese_name: シャーロット・スナック
description: Charlotte Snack is the 25th son and 44th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Bavarois. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Fries (フライ大臣, Furai Daijin?), governing over Potato Island.
Chuchun is a Super Sparrow ridden by Itomimizu. He and Itomimizu witnessed all the Davy Back Fight games between the Foxy Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates.
Bluegrass is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the siege of Egghead.

Borsalino, more commonly known by his alias Kizaru, is an Admiral in the Marines. After Kuzan resigned from the Marines and Sakazuki was promoted to Fleet Admiral, Kizaru is now the only remaining Admiral from the previous trio.

affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Buggy's Delivery (former)
description: Stansen is a giant from Elbaf, who is a shipwright. After being imprisoned in the Auction House, he was freed alongside other slaves by Silvers Rayleigh during the Straw Hat Pirates' assault on the business.

Stronger is the horse that Doc Q rides on. Because Doc Q is seemingly always sick, he rides on Stronger all the time, since the doctor tends to collapse if left unsupported for some time; however, Stronger is just as sick as he is. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".
devil_fruit_name: Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus

japanese_name: シャーロット・ユーエン
description: Charlotte Yuen is the 35th son and 64th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.
Clapp was the father of Bartholomew Kuma and a member of the Buccaneers race.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ズコット
description: Charlotte Zuccotto is the 11th son and the 18th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Alcohol (酒大臣, Sake Daijin?), governing over Liqueur Island.
Chesskippa the Hanger-on is a pirate captain from Robin's past.
Didit is a noble living in the Goa Kingdom on Dawn Island. She is the wife of Outlook III, the biological mother of Sabo, and the adoptive mother of Sterry.
Bluejam was the captain of the Bluejam Pirates, and an infamous pirate of the East Blue. He was one of the main antagonists of the Post-War Arc.

japanese_name: シャーロット・アナナ
description: Charlotte Anana is the 39th daughter of the Charlotte Family, as well as the 85th and youngest overall child, and is a member of the Big Mom Pirates.
Busshiri was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
Den is Tom's younger brother. He is a bering wolffish merman. He is also a shipwright and a Sea Forest researcher.
Bushon is one of the Sea Train organizers in Water 7, along with Stevie.
Devil Dias is a pirate and the former captain of the Acumate Pirates, but was captured and sold as a slave to the family of World Noble Saint Rosward.

affiliations: Kozuki Family; Nine Red Scabbards; Kyoshiro Family; Kurozumi Family (undercover)
description: Denjiro is a samurai from Wano Country and one of the Nine Red Scabbards who served as Kozuki Oden's retainers.
Coburn was the leader of the Shandia tribe from 400 years ago.

japanese_name: ビルディング・スネイク
description: Building Snake is one of the Senior Officers and the navigator of the Red Hair Pirates.
Clione is a member of the Heart Pirates.
Candy is the captain of the Candy Pirates.
Chess is a former minister of defense serving under Wapol. After the attack of Blackbeard, he became a pirate alongside his king, until their subsequent return to Drum Island.

Professor Clover was the director of the Ohara Library, and a leading authority on archaeology. He was a professor and scholar who studied poneglyphs with his fellow colleagues in the Tree of Knowledge. During his younger years, he was also an infamous explorer known for getting repeatedly caught by the Marines.
Benn Beckman is the first mate of the Red Hair Pirates.

affiliations: Animals of the Island of Rare Animals
description: Cocox is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".
Vice Admiral Comil is the commander of Marine Base G-2. He first appeared in Portgas D. Ace's cover story, and later took part in the Summit War of Marineford.

japanese_name: バーソロミュー・くま
affiliations: Revolutionary Army; Freedom Fighters (former); Seven Warlords of the Sea (former); Sorbet Kingdom (former)
description: Bartholomew Kuma is a former Warlord of the Sea, the former king of the Sorbet Kingdom, and an officer and founding member of the Revolutionary Army with a bounty of 296,000,000. As a pirate, Kuma sailed the seas as a single-person pirate crew. He is also the adoptive father of Jewelry Bonney, daughter of his late friend and fellow revolutionary Ginny. Kuma is a member of the near-extinct special race known as the buccaneers, inherited from his late father Clapp.
Conney is the queen dowager of the Sorbet Kingdom as the mother of King Bulldog.

japanese_name: ミス・バッキンガム・ステューシー
description: Miss Buckingham Stussy, currently going by Miss Buckin, is a former member of both the Rocks Pirates and the illegal science institute MADS. She is the self-proclaimed lover of the deceased Emperor Edward Newgate and the mother of Edward Weevil, a former Warlord of the Sea.

Mother Carmel was a child trafficker dealing in orphans, that operated in the Underworld several decades ago, under the code name of "Mountain Witch". Running an orphanage known as the "Sheep's House", her seemingly benevolent nature caused her to be known as the "Holy Mother".

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: Concelot is a fox mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.
Carne is one of the main cooks at the Baratie, currently serving as the restaurant's head charcutier.

affiliations: Kuja (Kuja Pirates); Seven Warlords of the Sea (former)
description: "Pirate Empress" Boa Hancock is the captain of the Kuja Pirates and was the only female Warlord of the Sea before the organization's disbandment. She is the current empress, known as the "Snake Princess", of Amazon Lily and rules over the Kuja tribe with her two younger sisters, Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold.

Corgi is a World Government official who took part in the mission to acquire the blueprints of Pluton and escort the prisoners Nico Robin and Cutty Flam to Enies Lobby. He acted as the leader of the forces in the Sea Train, answering directly to the CP9 agents.

affiliations: Fire Tank Pirates; Big Mom Pirates (former)
description: Capone "Gang" Bege is a mafia don-turned-pirate and the captain of the Fire Tank Pirates. He is also one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". He and his crew came from West Blue, where Bege was one of the heads of the Five Families of the West. During the timeskip, he became a subordinate of Charlotte Linlin and married Charlotte Chiffon. The two have a son named Capone Pez. While working under the Big Mom Pirates, he held a position of a rook-ranked combatant.
CB Gallant was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
Cezar is the recently-crowned king of Ilisia Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
Cosette is the head chef employed in the Germa Kingdom's royal household.
Sergeant Cosmo is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. Sergeant Cosmo was first introduced in cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.
Cornelia is a member of the Spade Pirates.
Chabo is a young boy from Gosa Village. He works for Nojiko on her tangerine farm.
Couran is the king of Cameron Kingdom (キャメロン王国, Kyameron Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

affiliations: Caribou Pirates; Fake Straw Hat Crew (former, temporary)
description: "Wet-Haired Caribou" is an infamous rookie pirate who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Straw Hat Pirates' reunion. He has earned a bounty of 210,000,000, making him part of the new generation of rookie pirates with bounties over 100,000,000.

affiliations: Caribou Pirates; Fake Straw Hat Crew (former, temporary)
description: "Blood-Splatterer" Coribou is a captain of the Caribou Pirates, along with his big brother Caribou.
Cerberus was a wild zombie who served under Gecko Moria.
Dellinger is a combatant and an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army who is a hybrid between a human and a fighting fish fish-man.

Catarina Devon, known as the "Crescent Moon Hunter", was the most dangerous female pirate ever to be imprisoned in Impel Down within the entire age of pirates. She was freed by Marshall D. Teach and recruited to the Blackbeard Pirates, where she joined the Ten Titanic Captains as captain of the sixth ship.
devil_fruit_name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune

description: Bunny Joe is a member of the Revolutionary Army and the leader of the group that rescued people of Tequila Wolf from slavery along with Nico Robin.

japanese_name: シャーロット・プリン
description: Charlotte Pudding is the 35th daughter and the 76th child of the Charlotte Family, an officer of the Big Mom Pirates, and a hybrid between a human and a member of the Three-Eye Tribe. She also works as a chocolatier and the owner of cafe "Caramel" on Cacao Island, as the candidate for the vacant position of Minister of Chocolate (チョコレート大臣, Chokorēto Daijin?). She was once Sanji's arranged fiancée, per the political agreement between their families. She is currently held captive by the Blackbeard Pirates.

japanese_name: シャーロット・スムージー
description: Charlotte Smoothie is the 14th daughter and 35th child of the Charlotte Family, the older triplet sister of Citron and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She serves as one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and as Totto Land's Minister of Juice (ジュース大臣, Jūsu Daijin?), governing over 100% Island.

affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy's Delivery; (Unknown status)? Buggy Pirates; Buggy and Alvida Alliance; Four Emperors; Seven Warlords of the Sea; (former); Roger Pirates; (former); Impel Down (former)
description: Buggy the Star Clown is the captain of the Buggy Pirates as well as the co-leader of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance, and a former apprentice of the Roger Pirates alongside Shanks. Shortly after the Summit War of Marineford, he became a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea and the leader of the pirate dispatch organization "Buggy's Delivery". He later lost his Warlord title when the system was abolished but was then recognized as one of the Four Emperors following the downfalls of Kaidou and Big Mom and the creation of the Cross Guild, of which he is publicly recognized as the leader.
Chap is the king of Deul Kingdom (ドイル王国, Doiru Ōkoku?) in the North Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; SMILE Factory (former)Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Chao is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the SMILE Factory.
Ginko is a little girl who lived on Punk Hazard. She was one of the children Momonosuke met when he came to the island. She is only named in the anime.
Hakowan is Wapol's pet dog, acquired after Wapol was permanently deposed from Drum Island.

japanese_name: チャドロス・ヒゲリゲス
affiliations: Caesar Clown (defected), Centaur Patrol Unit (defected); Brownbeard Pirates (disbanded)
description: Chadros Higelyges, better known as Brownbeard, is a former New World pirate. After Whitebeard's death he went off and took control of Foodvalten, one of the New World islands formerly under Whitebeard's protection.
Hakugan is the helmsman of the Heart Pirates.
Chaka the Jackal is one of two head guards in the Arabasta kingdom who serves under Igaram, alongside Pell. Chaka was the acting captain of the royal guard in Igaram's absence.
devil_fruit_name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal

description: Cyrano is a character in Oda's one-shot, Monsters, and was a swordsman from Ryuma's past.
Curiel is the former 10th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

affiliations: Beautiful Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Bourgeois Kingdom
description: Cavendish of the White Horse, also known as the "Pirate Prince", is a famous Super Rookie and the captain of the Beautiful Pirates. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Cavendish decided to pledge his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became the captain of the first ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
Giro Chintaro is a samurai from Wano Country who was appointed as the kaishakunin for Zorojuro's seppuku ritual.
Han-ko is a child from Ebisu Town.
Crocus is a doctor and the caretaker of the whale Laboon as well as the overseer of the Twin Cape Lighthouse that guides ships coming down from Reverse Mountain into the Grand Line.
Fukumi was the younger sister of Fukurokuju.

Stussy is MADS' first-ever successful clone, having been modeled after Miss Buckingham Stussy. She is a spy in the employ of Dr. Vegapunk who spent years working deeply undercover in the World Government until she was forced to discard her cover.
Su is a Cloud Fox and pet of Conis.
D.R. is one of the main antagonists in Oda's one-shot, Monsters.

japanese_name: シャーロット・アングレ
description: Charlotte Anglais is the 42nd son and 78th child of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates, Buggy's Delivery (resigned); Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Hajrudin is a giant warrior described as the "new generation" from Elbaf. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met Monkey D. Luffy and eventually pledged his loyalty towards him.
Dachoman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

affiliations: Kurozumi Family; Beasts Pirates (former); Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kozuki Family (former)
description: Fukurokuju is a ninja and the previous captain of the Orochi Oniwabanshu before they joined the Beasts Pirates following Orochi's deposition. Though he pledged his team's support to Kaidou, Fukurokuju remained loyal to the surviving Orochi and helped him attempt to get revenge. However, Fukurokuju was ultimately bested in combat by his rival Raizo as his and Orochi's plot failed.
Ginrummy is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates.
Daidalos was a giant squid that was close friends with Ikaros Much. He was first shown when Ikaros was thinking of him.
Dagama is the tactician of the Prodence Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
Daddy Dee is one of the houseparents, alongside Mummy Mee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.
Fukurou the Silent is an agent of CP0.

Curly Dadan is a friend of Monkey D. Garp and the foster mother of Portgas D. Ace and Monkey D. Luffy. Garp entrusted her to take care of Ace shortly after the boy's birth. Later, Garp also left Luffy in Dadan's care. She took care of Sabo too when he moved in.

"Double Ironfist" Fullbody is a Marine lieutenant commander serving under Rear Admiral Hina. He was a Marine Headquarters lieutenant at the start of the series, but was demoted to seaman recruit as a condition when he helped the former Black Cat pirate, Jango, get acquitted for his past crimes (in the anime, it was after getting into a fight with Sanji on the Baratie). During the timeskip, however, he rose back through the ranks to become a commissioned officer once again, being one rank higher than he was to begin with in the series.
Compo is a member of the Kid Pirates.
Furrari is the king of Nagagutsu Kingdom (ナガグツ王国, Nagagutsu Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is also the father of Tritobu.

Diez Barrels was a Marine officer who defected to become a pirate. Thirteen years ago, he was the captain of the Barrels Pirates while operating in the North Blue until he was killed by Donquixote Doflamingo during an attempt to sell the Ope Ope no Mi to the Marines. He was also the father of X Drake.
Fuza is the giant Three-length Bird of the Skypiean Priest Shura, who rode on it to get around to the different places at Skypiea.
Diesel is a Longarm and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.
Diamante is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Diamond seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Diamante Army subdivision.

Bentham of the Wild, alias Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works and an okama. He was a major antagonist during the Arabasta Arc, and (along with his fellow Officer Agents) one of the central characters in Miss Goldenweek's "Operation: Meet Baroque Works".
N/A
Capone "Gang" Pez is the infant son of Capone Bege and Charlotte Chiffon, as well as the grandson of Charlotte Linlin and Pound.

english_name: Funkfreed (FUNimation, Viz manga); Funk Freed (Unlimited Adventure)
description: Funkfreed is Spandam's sword, a unique weapon that "ate" the Zou Zou no Mi and became an Elephant Sword (象剣, Zōken?). As such, he also serves as a pet and unofficial bodyguard for Spandam, compensating his master's physical slightness.
N/A
"Howling" Gab is one of the Senior Officers of the Red Hair Pirates.

affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Rumbar Pirates (former); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: "Soul King" Brook is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates, one of their two swordsmen, and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the ninth member of the crew and the eighth to join, doing so at the end of the Thriller Bark Arc.

Daifugo is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who served as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country until his defeat during the prison uprising. After being tamed by Kurozumi Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

japanese_name: シャーロット・バサンズ
description: Charlotte Basans is the 23rd son and 39th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Saint-Marc. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Giolla is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army.
N/A

japanese_name: シャーロット・ババロア
description: Charlotte Bavarois is the 26th son and 45th child of the Charlotte Family, as well as an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He is the younger twin brother of Snack.

japanese_name: シャーロット・バスカルテ
description: Charlotte Basskarte is the 13th son and 22nd child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Nusstorte and Dosmarche. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Hildon was a Wild Zombie that resembled a stitched-up vampire. He appeared to act as a messenger in-between the members of Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four, reporting to them noteworthy events that were happening throughout the island ship before it fell.
Hidayu is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ブラウニー
description: Charlotte Brownie is the 32nd son and 58th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He joined Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.

affiliations: Germa Kingdom; NEO MADS; Fire Tank Pirates (former); Donquixote Pirates (former); Marines and World Government (former); MADS (former)
description: Caesar Clown, who was referred to as "Master" by his subordinates, is a scientist, the leading expert on chemical weapons of mass destruction, and one of the co-founders of NEO MADS.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ブロワイエ
description: Charlotte Broyé is the ninth daughter and 20th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin sister of Brûlée. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Meringue (メレンゲ大臣, Merenge Daijin?), governing over Milenge Island.
Hihimaru is a baboon that was formerly a guard for the Beasts Pirates before being tamed by Tama.

japanese_name: シャーロット・カバレッタ
description: Charlotte Cabaletta is the eighth son and the 13th child of the Charlotte Family and the fourth quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cadenza, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Conis is a citizen of Skypiea who befriended Monkey D. Luffy and his crew after their arrival. She is Pagaya's daughter and owner of a cloud fox named Su.
Commander Gaburu (ガブル隊長, Gaburu Taichō?) was a revolutionist commander who led a militia group on an unknown island.

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom, Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: Carrot is a rabbit mink and Kingsbird of the Mokomo Dukedom and a member of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad. She was trained by Pedro, whose will she carries on.

Higuma was a mountain bandit and the leader of the Higuma Bandits. He was the first antagonist to be introduced in the series, and the first of three in the Romance Dawn Arc (third of three in the anime).
Cosmos is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

Hinokizu is the name given to a mysterious man possessing a burn scar. He is rumored to possess the Road Poneglyph which was once on Fish-Man Island and whose location is now unknown. He is said to sail on an all-black ship.

japanese_name: シャーロット・カデンツァ
description: Charlotte Cadenza is the seventh son and the twelfth child of the Charlotte Family and the third quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cabaletta, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Hip is a member of the Kid Pirates.

japanese_name: シャーロット・シナモン
description: Charlotte Cinnamon is the 16th daughter and 37th child of the Charlotte Family, the younger triplet sister of Smoothie and Citron, and a longleg-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ブリュレ
description: Charlotte Brûlée is the eighth daughter and 19th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin sister of Broyé. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Byron is one of the slaves who was sold at the Human Auctioning House and was the first in the queue for sale. He is a pirate and musician.

japanese_name: シャーロット・シブースト
description: Charlotte Chiboust is the 30th son and 51st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Mix (ミックス大臣, Mikkusu Daijin?), governing over Sanshoku Island. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Luffy on Cacao Island.
Hiramera is an olive flounder mermaid and a dancer in the Mermaid Café.

japanese_name: シャーロット・シフォン
description: Charlotte Chiffon is the 22nd daughter and the 52nd child of the Charlotte Family and Totto Land's former Minister of Puff (ふんわり大臣, Funwari Daijin?, Viz: "Minister of Fluff") having governed over Funwari Island until her defection. She is Capone Bege's wife and the mother of Capone Pez, as well as a member of Bege's Fire Tank Pirates.

"Black Cage" Hina is a Marine officer and a former classmate of Vice Admiral Smoker. She currently leads the Black Cage Corps, a unit (containing Jango and Fullbody among others) tasked with patrolling the seas around the Arabasta Kingdom.
Gaimon is a former pirate who currently lives as a hermit on the Island of Rare Animals.
General Galaxy is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. General Galaxy was first introduced in cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.
Gal is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
Dr. Hiriluk was a quack doctor from Drum Island, as well as Tony Tony Chopper's father figure. He was also a former thief.

japanese_name: シャーロット・シトロン
description: Charlotte Citron is the 15th daughter and 36th child of the Charlotte Family, the middle triplet sister of Smoothie and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Eggs (エッグ大臣, Eggu Daijin?), governing over Kimi Island.
Ibiributsu is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region of Wano Country. He is in charge of exchanging meal tickets for kibi dango.

japanese_name: シャーロット・コンポート
description: Charlotte Compote is the eldest daughter and second child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Fruits (フルーツ大臣, Furūtsu Daijin?), governing over Fruits Island.
Duke Hitsugisukan is a sheep mink and the former ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom before Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.
Chessmarimo is a fusion of Chess and Kuromarimo, created by Wapol's Baku Baku Factory.
Ideaman is a member of Krieg Pirates. He is the Staff Officer of Planning.

Ginny was the former East Army commander of the Revolutionary Army, having joined the group alongside Bartholomew Kuma 22 years ago, back when they were known as the Freedom Fighters. She was the mother of Jewelry Bonney.

japanese_name: イチカ, ニカ, サンカ, ヨンカ, ヨンカツー
english_name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Two
description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.
Iceburg is the president of the Galley-La company and the mayor of Water 7.
Jaki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "four".
Jorge was the head of the Judicial Ship that sailed to Water 7. He was the one who judged Tom for his support of the Pirate King Gol D. Roger.
Jacksonbanner was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
N/A

japanese_name: シャーロット・エンゼル
description: Charlotte Angel is the seventh daughter and 17th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet sister of Cracker and Custard. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

debut: Episode 48; Romance Dawn Story; Chapter 902; Episode 877
description: "Crescent-Moon" Gally is the captain of the Gally Pirates, currently active in the East Blue.

japanese_name: シャーロット・コンスターチ
description: Charlotte Cornstarch is the 11th daughter and 27th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet sister of Moscato and Mash. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Love (愛情大臣, Aijō Daijin?), governing over Loving Island.
O-Hana is a citizen of Wano Country, residing in the Flower Capital.
Hamburg is a combatant of the Foxy Pirates and also the leader of the Groggy Monsters. Along with Porche, he was one of Foxy's first crewmates.
Ham Burger is the king of the Ballywood Kingdom, acting as chairman of the most recent Levely.
Daigin is a Marine Commodore who led the team that went to Impel Down to capture the intruder, Monkey D. Luffy.
Gama Pyonnosuke is a toad that sat atop Usopp's head during his stay in Wano Country.
Gion, better known by her alias Momousagi, is a Marine vice admiral.
Bepo is a polar bear mink and the navigator of the Heart Pirates. He is the younger brother of the late Nox Pirate Zepo.
Disc J is a member of the Kid Pirates.

affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu; Kurozumi Family
description: Daikoku is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
The Dirt Boss is a giant mole awoken by Gedatsu during his work for Goro in his cover story.
Giovanni is a zebra mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.

affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy's Delivery; Buggy and Alvida Alliance; Baroque Works (formerly)
description: "Loan Shark" Galdino, alias Mr. 3, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works, alongside his partner Miss Goldenweek.
N/A

affiliations: Barto Club; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Gambia the Missionary is the staff officer of the Barto Club. He was also a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
N/A

Kinderella, also known as Miss Universe, is a woman who married Wapol after he became the head of his own corporation. Two years after that, she became the queen of Black Drum Kingdom when Wapol became its king.

Kingbaum is a tree homie, a member of the Big Mom Pirates, and the master of the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. However, he was forced to serve the Straw Hat Pirates due to them possessing Charlotte Linlin's Vivre Card.

english_name: Django (Viz, 4Kids, Funimation subs); Jango (FUNimation dub, WT100, live-action series)
description: The subject of this article is sometimes called Django.
Eiri is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was once severely injured by a young Charlotte Linlin.

description: N/A
The Belly, commonly represented as (a Latin lowercase esh superimposed over a capital B), is the world's main monetary unit.

Sugar is a special officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. She was one of the most integral components of Doflamingo's plan in keeping Dressrosa in line, as any dissenters were turned into toys by her Hobi Hobi no Mi powers. She is also the younger sister of Monet. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist during the Dressrosa Arc.
