Onimaru is a komagitsune who was once the companion of the late daimyo of Ringo, Shimotsuki Ushimaru.
devil_fruit_name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo

description: Queen Otohime was a goldfish mermaid, the queen of the Ryugu Kingdom, the wife of king Neptune, and the mother of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi.

japanese_name: ドンキホーテ・ホーミング
description: Saint Donquixote Homing was the father of Doflamingo and Rosinante. A former World Noble of the Donquixote Family, he withdrew from his position and left Mary Geoise in order to live a normal life with his family. After suffering two years of abuse from prejudiced civilians, Homing was killed by his then ten-year-old son, Doflamingo.

japanese_name: モンキー・Dディー・ドラゴン
description: Monkey D. Dragon, also known as the "Rebellious Dragon", is the infamous Supreme Commander (総司令官, Sōshireikan?) of the Revolutionary Army and one of its founding members, as well as formerly the captain of the Freedom Fighters. He used to be part of the Marines but became disillusioned with the organization's outlook on justice; this, along with the fallout from the Ohara Incident, sparked Dragon's desire to attempt to overthrow the World Government, with his endeavors ultimately causing him to be labeled the "World's Worst Criminal".

japanese_name: ポートガス・Dディー・ルージュ
affiliations: Gol D. Roger; Portgas D. Ace
description: Portgas D. Rouge was the mother of Portgas D. Ace and the lover of Gol D. Roger.
N/A
Tate is a nurse who worked for the Whitebeard Pirates as part of the crew's medical division.
Tegata Ringana is a doctor on Dressrosa.
Flare is a character from Eiichiro Oda's One-Shot Monsters.
Taroimo is a cyborg dog from Karakuri Island.
Tea IV is the king of Eigis Kingdom on the Grand Line and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
Colonel Mugren was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
Muchana is a doctor who currently works in Impel Down's medical room.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tonta Corps; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Flapper is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit, when he stopped Leo from taking Robin's clothes and belongings. He participated in Operation SOP and became a temporary victim of Sugar's Hobi Hobi no Mi.
Rangram was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
Kojuro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
Komachiyo is a komainu that resides in the Kuri region of Wano Country. It has been Kurozumi Tama's best friend since their childhood.
Dr. Kurotsuru, also named "Dr. Black Beard" based on the same name on the lapel of his coat, is a doctor who appeared in Ace's cover story.
Tenjo-Sagari is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.
Great Michael is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
Charlotte Gala is the ninth son and the 14th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cadenza, and Cabaletta.
Guernica is a masked agent of CP0.
Fossa is the former 15th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

Minatomo is a legendary carpenter in Wano Country and the leader of a guild that Franky joined to get access to the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress. He is related to another person, whose name is also Minatomo, who is a descendant of someone who traveled from Wano to East Blue.
Gyoru is a fishmonger in Foosha Village and the husband of Chicken. Luffy bought fish from him when he was a kid.

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Musketeers; Kozuki Family; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded); Nine Red Scabbards; Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)
description: Duke Inuarashi is a canine mink and was one of the two rulers of the Mokomo Dukedom, dubbed the "Ruler of Day" as he formerly ruled over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM. He and Nekomamushi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards.
Gyogyo is a member of the Bonney Pirates. He was once a resident of the Sorbet Kingdom, having been a friend of Bartholomew Kuma and Ginny since childhood.
N/A
Rint was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
N/A
N/A
Ririka is a bartender who runs a local bar in Shells Town. She is also the mother of Rika.
Doran is a child who was captured and kept in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
Commander Ripper was one of Morgan's officers at his base in the East Blue. After Morgan's defeat, he takes control of the base's operations.
Pisaro is the musician of the Arlong Pirates. He is an ocean sunfish fish-man. He was previously a member of the Sun Pirates.
Saint Pluming is a World Noble.
Monster is one of the Senior Officers and musicians of the Red Hair Pirates. He first appeared playing with his crew at the Partys Bar.

japanese_name: ゴール・Dディー・ロジャー
description: Gol D. Roger, more commonly known as Gold Roger, was a legendary pirate who, as captain of the Roger Pirates, held the title of Pirate King and owned the legendary treasure known as One Piece. He was also the lover of Portgas D. Rouge and the biological father of Portgas D. Ace.
Pomp is a member of the Kid Pirates.

japanese_name: ドンキホーテ・ロシナンテ
english_name: Don Quixote Rocinante (Viz); Donquixote Rosinante (Funimation subs); Don Quixote Rosinante (Funimation dub)
description: Donquixote Rosinante was formerly a World Noble of the Donquixote Family descent, as the second son of Donquixote Homing and the younger brother of Donquixote Doflamingo. After his family lost their status as Celestial Dragons and became pariahs, Rosinante became an Elite Officer of the Donquixote Pirates, serving Doflamingo under the codename Corazon.
Rivers was the sniper of the Bellamy Pirates.
N/A
Hocker was the owner of the Pet Food Shop in Orange Town and the owner of Chouchou.
Poppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the younger triplet brother of Heppoko and Peppoko.
Poker is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
Robson is Wapol's pet, and personal transport. He is a White Walkie, also known as "Wooly Hippo".
N/A
Porchemy was a member of the Bluejam Pirates until he was killed by his captain Bluejam for losing to Ace and Sabo.
Rockstar is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, being relatively new in the crew two years ago.
Poro is a bookstore owner from Orange Town.
Foxy the Silver Fox is the captain of the Foxy Pirates, and the main antagonist of the Long Ring Long Land Arc.
Mr. Motzel is a gourmand and one of the known customers of the Baratie.
Terracotta is Igaram's wife and the royal head chef who appeared very late in the Arabasta Arc. She is also the royal seamstress. Her friend and helper is Maidy.

Fukaboshi is a shark merman and the eldest son of the royal Neptune Family on Fish-Man Island. After he, his father and his brothers were liberated by the Straw Hat Pirates, he allied himself with them against Hody Jones and his crew.

japanese_name: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ
english_name: Don Quixote Doflamingo (VIZ); Donquixote Doflamingo (Funimation subs)
affiliations: Donquixote Pirates; Impel Down; Underworld; World Government (secret); Seven Warlords of the Sea (former); Dressrosa (former)
description: Donquixote Doflamingo, nicknamed "Heavenly Yaksha", is the captain of the Donquixote Pirates. Prior to his imprisonment, he was a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea with a frozen bounty of 340,000,000, as well as the most influential underworld broker under the codename "Joker". He is also a former World Noble, descended from the Donquixote Family.
Rabiyan is a flying carpet homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.

japanese_name: ローリング・ローガン
description: Rolling Logan is an army commander of the Majiatsuka Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

japanese_name: ロックス・Dディー・ジーベック
english_name: Rocks D. Xebec (VIZ); Rox (Funimation, formerly VIZ )
description: Rocks D. Xebec, commonly known simply as Rocks, was the captain of the Rocks Pirates. He was a prominent figure 44 years ago, before the Pirate King Gol D. Roger came into power. He was ultimately defeated by an alliance formed by Monkey D. Garp and Roger, earning Garp the nickname "Hero of the Marines".

The Mountain God, respectfully called Yama-san (山さん, Yama-san?, VIZ Media: Yama) by Kozuki Oden and his retainers, is a giant boar that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was cut down by Kozuki Oden during its attack on Flower Capital, but it ultimately survived the ordeal.
Raideen is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was shown training Hajrudin.

Ryunosuke was a "Rising Dragon" (昇り竜, Nobori Ryū?) created by Kurozumi Kanjuro using the power of the Fude Fude no Mi. It was created to aid Kurozumi Kanjuro, Kin'emon, Trafalgar Law, and the Straw Hat Pirates in scaling the leg of Zunesha to reach Zou, and received its name from the Straw Hats.
"Crane Rider" Randolph is a rabbit homie and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

japanese_name: ハリーツ・ケンディヨ
description: N/A
Sadi is a chief guard of Impel Down. She always wants to be addressed as Little Sadi (サディちゃん, Sadi-chan?).
Herb was a Shandia from 400 years ago. She was Kalgara's wife and Mousse's mother.

japanese_name: MAXマックス マークス
description: MAX Marx was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

japanese_name: フィッシャー・タイガー
description: Fisher Tiger, known as the Adventurer, was a sea bream Fish-Man and the founder and original captain of the Sun Pirates.
S-Bear is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Bartholomew Kuma.

japanese_name: シャーロット・フランペ
description: Charlotte Flampe is the 36th daughter and 77th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates, serving as the Captain of the Special Attack Unit (特攻隊長, Tokkō-taichō?, Viz: "Kamikaze Captain"). She is also Totto Land's Minister of Honey (はちみつ大臣, Hachimitsu Daijin?), governing over Rokumitsu Island, and the President of the Katakuri Fan Club (カタクリファンクラブ会長, Katakuri Fan Kurabu Kaichō?).
Ninjin is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Piiman and Tamanegi, before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.
Heracles is a strange warrior that used to reside in the Greenstone forest in the Boin Archipelago. He trained Usopp in the use of Pop Greens for two years.
Mayushika is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.

Moyle is a Skypiean and the father of Mochi. He originally worked for Gan Fall in the Divine Squad, but after Enel took over, he and the other members were forced to work in God's Army until they were betrayed and almost killed.
N/A
Mousse was the daughter of Kalgara and Herb and was considered the most beautiful of the Shandia women on the island of Jaya four hundred years ago.
N/A
Mouseman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. He resides in Bakura Town.
Hewitt was the chef of the Bellamy Pirates.
N/A
Samurai Batts is a visitor on Kyuka Island.
Samosa is a king and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

"Hundredth Dan" Hack is a Japanese soldierfish fish-man and a member of the Revolutionary Army, which he serves as combat instructor. He went to Dressrosa to investigate the arms trafficking there and competed at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
The Risky Brothers were a duo of Wild Zombie squirrels that served under Perona. They were animated from the shadows of two pirates by the same name.
Francois is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5.
"Thunder Lord" McGuy is an infamous New World pirate who allied with Whitebeard.

affiliations: Rolling Pirates; Thriller Bark Victim's Association
description: The Risky Brothers are two male pirates working as members of the Rolling Pirates under their captain, Lola. They were members of the Thriller Bark Victim's Association, a group of Gecko Moria's victims who banded together. During the time their shadows were stolen from them, they were placed in two squirrel zombies who were also named the Risky Brothers.
Meadows participated in a competition at the Corrida Colosseum as a gladiator to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

affiliations: Current Unknown; Brook (former); Longarm Tribe's warriors (former)
description: Sancrin the Thief is a member of the Longarm Tribe and Brook's former manager.
Hibari is a Marine Commander. She is also a member of SWORD.
The Mecha-Shark is a cyborg shark created by Vegapunk alongside the Sea Beast Weapons.
Fugetsu Omusubi was a samurai who, as a member of the Fugetsu Family, served as the most recent daimyo of the Kibi region until he was imprisoned and killed by Kaidou 20 years ago.
Mr. 7 was a frontier agent of Baroque Works. He died on duty when he attempted to forcefully recruit Roronoa Zoro to the organization. His position was filled by the next Mr. 7.
Isa is a Shandia woman and Aisa's mother.
N/A

"Big Knife" Sarquiss was the first mate of the Bellamy Pirates, with a bounty of 38,000,000 on his head. His epithet originates from the large dagger he always wields, which bears a strong resemblance to a massive kukri.
Ipponume is Ipponmatsu's wife.
Megalo is a shark that lives on Fish-Man Island. He is the beloved pet of Princess Shirahoshi and former pet of the Neptune Army.
Roche was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
Ipponmatsu is the owner of an arms shop in Loguetown and Ipponume's husband. He was the former owner of both Sandai Kitetsu and Yubashiri.

japanese_name: エンポリオ・イワンコフ
affiliations: Revolutionary Army; Freedom Fighters (former); Kamabakka Kingdom; Newkama Land (former)
description: N/A
Milky is a reindeer mink and a member of the Guardians.
Mikio Itoo is a background joke character created by Eiichiro Oda, and arguably the first Easter Egg featured in One Piece.
Milo is a citizen of Dressrosa. While he was a toy, he was known as "Onepoco".
Millet Pine was a member of the Roger Pirates.
Terry is a bartender at a pub in Mock Town. He is not named in the manga, but his name was given in the databooks.
Mikazuki is the captain and only named member of the Big Helmet Pirates. He has a bounty of 36,000,000.
N/A
Lieutenant Junior Grade Rokkaku was one of Axe-Hand Morgan's officers at the 153rd Marine Branch. He currently serves under Commander Ripper.
Saber is a member of the Spade Pirates. Despite being commonly seen at Ace's side, he was allegedly not a commanding officer.
N/A
N/A
Sauce is the king of Jambalaya Kingdom (ジャンバラヤ王国, Janbaraya Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

japanese_name: ミス・ファーザーズデー
description: N/A

japanese_name: スコッパー・ギャバン
description: Scopper Gaban is a former member of the Roger Pirates.

"Courier" Mikita, more commonly known by her alias Miss Valentine, is a former officer agent who was partnered with Mr. 5. As of now, she is currently working as a chocolate lady alongside most of the other Baroque Works members at the new Spiders Cafe.
The Seaboar is a sea creature that debuted in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.

japanese_name: シーガル・ガンズ・ノズドン
description: Seagull Guns Nozdon is a former member of the Roger Pirates.
"Pretended Sleep" Raccoon is a West Blue Pirate Captain who was defeated by the Whitebeard Pirates.
Schollzo is a member of the Franky Family.

Satori of the Forest punished criminals with the Ordeal of Balls during Enel's reign. He was one of Enel's top warriors, the Skypiea Priests, until his defeat. He is also the oldest triplet brother of Hotori and Kotori. Due to this actions, he was a major antagonist of the Skypiea Arc.
N/A

Nika is the name of a mythical warrior that was once revered as the Sun God by slaves from the ancient times. He was first mentioned by Who's-Who, who heard about the legend from a prison guard during his imprisonment by the World Government. According to Dr. Vegapunk, Nika's existence is only recorded in the most ancient of texts, having been otherwise erased in more modern documents. Nika's legend has also been passed down for generations in the nearly extinct Buccaneer race, being that Bartholomew Kuma learned about Nika's existence from his father during his days of slavery to give him hope, and Kuma later passed this same legend to his adopted daughter, Jewelry Bonney.
Saru is the pet dog of two of the World Nobles, Saint Rosward and Saint Shalria.

japanese_name: シャーロット・アッシュ
description: Charlotte Hachée is the fourth daughter and eighth child of the Charlotte Family, the third quadruplet sister to Mondée, Amande, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Seki is the deposed king of Lulusia Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is the father of Princess Komane.
N/A
Kokoro is an icefish mermaid and the stationmaster for Shift Station, a Sea Train station near Water 7. She was also Tom's secretary during the days of Tom's Workers.
N/A

japanese_name: シャーロット・ハイファット
description: Charlotte High-Fat is the 20th son and 33rd child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Tablet. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

japanese_name: イエティ COOLクール BROTHERSブラザーズ
description: The Yeti Cool Brothers, Rock (ロック, Rokku?) and Scotch (スコッチ, Sukotchi?), are assassins who were employed by Caesar Clown until his defeat. They are members of a mysterious type of giants.

Maynard the Pursuer is a vice admiral who appears in the Dressrosa Arc. He was registered as a gladiator to compete at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi, but was defeated before he could participate.

japanese_name: マウンテン・リッキー
description: Mountain Ricky is a member of the Foxy Pirates. He fought George Mach before the third round of the Davy Back Fight.
N/A

japanese_name: シャーロット・カンテン
description: Charlotte Kanten is the 27th son and 48th child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Kato and Montb. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Agar (寒天大臣, Kanten Daijin?), governing over Jelly Island.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ジョコンド
description: Charlotte Joconde is the 27th daughter and 59th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was also a member of Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.
Sennorikyuru is the master of tea ceremonies and is considered the best cook of Wano Country.

"Overflowing" Sasaki is a bluespine unicornfish fish-man and one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. He also leads the crew's Armored Division. Before joining the Beasts Pirates, he captained his own crew called the Sasaki Pirates.
devil_fruit_name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops

japanese_name: シャーロット・ジョスカルポーネ
description: Charlotte Joscarpone is the 29th daughter and 63rd child of the Charlotte Family, the younger twin sister of Charlotte Mascarpone, and a Snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Nitro is a jelly homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.

japanese_name: シャーロット・カトウ
description: Charlotte Kato is the 28th son and 49th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Kanten and Montb. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Seeds (シード大臣, Shīdo Daijin?), governing over Tanega Island.
N/A
N/A
Seto was one of the Shandia who lived on Jaya four hundred years ago.

japanese_name: スクラッチメン・アプー
description: Scratchmen Apoo, also known as "Roar of the Sea", is the captain of the On Air Pirates and was formerly an informant for the Beasts Pirates, led by Kaidou of the Four Emperors.
Senor Pink is an assassin and officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. He was also the husband of Russian and the father of Gimlet.

affiliations: Revolutionary Army; Dadan Family (former); Goa Kingdom (defected)
description: "Flame Emperor" Sabo is the Revolutionary Army's chief of staff, recognized as the No. 2 of the entire organization and outranked only by Supreme Commander Monkey D. Dragon. He is also the sworn brother of the notorious pirates Monkey D. Luffy and the late Portgas D. Ace.
Shaka, also designated as Punk-01 (PUNK-01パンク ワン, Panku-Wan?), was one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "good".

Nola, known to many as the Master of the Sky, is a giant snake who lives on Upper Yard in Skypiea. Having lived for over four centuries, the snake was once the companion of Kalgara and Mont Blanc Noland back when Upper Yard was still part of Jaya. It is the grandchild of the snake Kashigami, whom the Shandia once worshiped as a god.

Sengoku the Buddha is a former Fleet Admiral of the Marines, succeeding Kong and preceding Sakazuki. He retired from his leadership position after the Summit War of Marineford, but remained in the Marines as an Inspector General.
devil_fruit_name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu

japanese_name: シャーロット・ラウリン
description: Charlotte Laurin is the 18th son and 29th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Compo. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.
Shachi is a member of the Heart Pirates.
Nora Gitsune is a fox who filled the role of the "pet" for the Fake Straw Hat Crew, who did not know that the real Chopper is the crew's doctor and is given human-traits by the Hito Hito no Mi.
Noriko is a nori maker who lives in Ebisu Town.
Nosgarl is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
Saint Shalria is a World Noble, the younger sister of Saint Charlos, and the daughter of Saint Rosward.

japanese_name: シャーロット・メープル
description: Charlotte Maple is the 26th daughter and 57th child of the Charlotte Family, the youngest quadruplet sister of Mobile, Marble, and Myukuru, and a Longarm-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.
Nojiko is the owner of a tangerine farm in Cocoyasi Village and is the adoptive older sister of Nami. They were raised together by their adoptive mother, Bell-mère.
N/A

Sham is an officer of the Black Cat Pirates. Along with his partner Buchi, he is also the protector of the crew's ship, the Bezan Black, and together they are known as the Nyaban Brothers (ニャーバン・兄弟ブラザーズ, Nyāban Burazāzu?).

japanese_name: シャーロット・カタクリ
description: Charlotte Katakuri is the second son and third child of the Charlotte Family and the elder triplet brother of Daifuku and Oven. He is also one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Flour (粉大臣, Kona Daijin?), governing over Komugi Island.

Mr. 7 is a former Frontier Agent of Baroque Works, being half of a sniper duo along with his partner, Miss Father's Day. He replaced the previous agent of the same codename when the latter died in the line of duty. Due to his actions, he is a minor antagonist in the Arabasta Arc.
Mero is a smelt-whiting mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.
Nugire Yainu was the shipwright of the Black Cat Pirates and the crew member who was killed three years prior to Luffy's visit to Syrup Village by the Marines.
Nyasha is a giant cat owned by the Vinsmoke Family that pulls their royal carriage.
The Shandia chief is the leader of the Shandia tribe.

japanese_name: モンキー・Dディー・ルフィ
affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Four Emperors; Dadan Family (former); Baratie (temporary, former); Impel Down (former); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: Monkey D. Luffy, also known as "Straw Hat Luffy" and commonly as "Straw Hat", is the founder and captain of the increasingly infamous and powerful Straw Hat Pirates, as well as the most powerful of its top fighters. He desires to find the legendary treasure left behind by the late Gol D. Roger and thereby become the Pirate King, which would help facilitate an unknown dream of his that he has told only to Shanks, his brothers, and crew. He believes that being the Pirate King means having the most freedom in the world.
devil_fruit_name: Gomu Gomu no Mi (Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika)

description: Merry is Kaya's butler, and the original designer of the Going Merry.
N/A
N/A
N/A
Shine is a Marine Chief Petty Officer who works under the command of Hina.
Ducky Bree is a member of the Spade Pirates.

Shimotsuki Koushirou is a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a master swordsman, he was both the teacher of as well as the distant relative of Roronoa Zoro. He is also the father of the late Shimotsuki Kuina and son of Shimotsuki Kozaburo. He is the master of Isshin Dojo in Shimotsuki Village.

Lu Feld, known as the "God of Fortune", is the "Loan Shark King" (闇金王, Yamikin-Ō?). He is a member of the Lu Feld Conglomerate (ルフェルド財閥, Ru Ferudo Zaibatsu?), the former financer of MADS, and an emperor of the Underworld.
Shelly is Tonjit's hooooorse and an animal of Long Ring Long Land.
Shinosuke is a ninja who serves the Kozuki Family. He is Shinobu's older brother.
Shion is a member of the Kuja. She is never seen but her name appears on the match-ups of the arena battle board.

Minatomo-san is a carpenter who was created by Oda as a One Piece SBS joke character to explain how the door Higuma kicked off its hinges was suddenly back in place as the bandit left the bar, after Higuma smashed a bottle of sake over Shanks.

Scarlett was the first daughter of the Riku Family and the former crown princess of Dressrosa until falsifying her own death. She was Viola's elder sister, Kyros' wife, and Rebecca's mother. She was killed by Diamante when Donquixote Pirates took over Dressrosa ten years ago.
N/A

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance
description: "Full Power" Shishilian is a lion mink and the captain of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, as well as one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.
Sarutobi is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
"Iron Boy" Scotch is a member of the Beasts Pirates working as the guardian of one of the former Emperor Kaidou's favorite islands.
Shioyaki is a salmon Fish-Man who was a member of the Arlong Pirates and the head of banquets.
Sheepshead is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who was in charge of the Gifters on Zou.
Ross is a former combatant of the Bellamy Pirates.

Shinobu is a kunoichi from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kozuki Family, having once served in the Oniwabanshu of the Kozuki Shogunate and trained under Kin'emon as his protégée. She is also the younger sister of Shinosuke.

japanese_name: ポートガス・Dディー・エース
english_name: Portgas D. Ace (uncut dub); Portgaz D. Ace (VIZ, Funimation subs); Portgaz D. Trace (edited dub)
affiliations: Whitebeard Pirates; Spade Pirates (former); Dadan Family (former); Impel Down (former)
description: Portgas D. Ace, born as Gol D. Ace and nicknamed "Fire Fist" Ace, was the biological son of the late Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, and Portgas D. Rouge, as well as the sworn older brother of Luffy and Sabo. Ace was adopted by Monkey D. Garp, as had been requested by Roger before his execution. Ace was captain of the Spade Pirates before being recruited into the Whitebeard Pirates and becoming its 2nd division commander. He ate the Mera Mera no Mi, giving him the power to transform into and manipulate flames.

japanese_name: イエティ COOLクール BROTHERSブラザーズ
description: The Yeti Cool Brothers, Rock (ロック, Rokku?) and Scotch (スコッチ, Sukotchi?), are assassins who were employed by Caesar Clown until his defeat. They are members of a mysterious type of giants.
Sleepy is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
Chichilisia is the leader of the Niho Navy and the father of Uholisia.
Solitaire is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country.

debut: Chapter 0; Chapter 530 (mentioned); Episode 425; One Piece Film: Strong World
affiliations: Golden Lion Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Impel Down (former)
description: Shiki the Golden Lion, also known as the "Flying Pirate", is the admiral and helmsman of the Golden Lion Pirates, the first known prisoner ever to escape from Impel Down and a former member of the Rocks Pirates.
Sicily is a Marine Rear Admiral.

Princess Shirahoshi, famous in the world as the Mermaid Princess (人魚姫, Ningyo Hime?), is a giant smelt-whiting mermaid and the princess of the Ryugu Kingdom, as the youngest of King Neptune's children and the only daughter in the Neptune royal family.

japanese_name: シルバーズ・レイリー
description: Silvers Rayleigh, also known as the "Dark King", is an extremely powerful and famous retired pirate who formerly served as the first mate of the legendary Roger Pirates, being known as the "Right Hand of the Pirate King". He is one of the major figures, along with Whitebeard, Shiki, Monkey D. Garp, Sengoku, Tsuru and Kong from the times when Gol D. Roger, the "Pirate King", was still alive.
Speed Jiru is the former 14th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
Konbu is a child who lived in Punk Hazard's Biscuits Room. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
N/A
Hanger is an employee at Robecca Hanberg, a clothing store in Loguetown. Nami tried on all of his best clothes, but did not buy any.
Disco is the owner of the now-bankrupt Human Auctioning House at Grove 1 in Sabaody Archipelago.
Kinbo is a boy who lives in Okobore Town of Kuri with his mother Yame and his little brother.
Sunbell is a former member of the Roger Pirates.
Sentomaru is the bodyguard of Dr. Vegapunk and is in command of the Marines' Science Unit (科学部隊, Kagaku Butai?) as its captain (隊長, taichō?).

Koyama, as named by Kozuki Oden and his retainers, is a white boar and the child of the Mountain God that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was kidnapped from its parent and later stolen by Kin'emon.

Kibagaeru was the captain of the Fanged Toad Pirates until he lost to Foxy at the Davy Back Fight and joined his crew. Due to his anime-exclusive actions, he can be considered one of the main antagonists of the Foxy's Return Arc.
Kop is a member of the Franky Family.

Kong is the World Government Commander-in-Chief. He was a Fleet Admiral of the Marines at the time of the Battle in Edd War twenty-seven years ago. Some time after, he was promoted while Sengoku eventually became the new Fleet Admiral.
Kiku is a member of the Kuja. She is never seen but her name appears on the match-ups of the arena battle board.
Kikipatsu is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
Jobo is a citizen of Mock Town.
Commodore Kibin is a Marine officer that debuted during the Marineford Arc. His canon name and rank are unknown. However, in the anime, he was given the name Kibin and the rank of Commodore.

japanese_name: ドンキホーテ・ミョスガルド聖
english_name: Don Quixote Myosgard (VIZ, Funimation dub (Ep 545), Funimation) Don Quixote Mjosgard (Funimation, former)
description: N/A

japanese_name: ジョン・ジャイアント
description: John Giant is a Vice Admiral in the Marine Headquarters, and the first giant to ever enlist in the Marines.

japanese_name: シャーロット・リンリン
affiliations: Big Mom Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Four Emperors (former); Charlotte Family
description: Charlotte Linlin, better known as "Big Mom", is the captain of the Big Mom Pirates and was formerly one of the Four Emperors ruling over the New World, as the only female member of that group. She is the matriarch of the very large Charlotte Family, whose many children make up the infrastructure of her crew. She is also the creator of the unique race of creatures known as Homies, who mainly inhabit all of Totto Land, and happily serve her. Big Mom possesses three special homies, Napoleon, Prometheus, and Zeus, but unhappy with Zeus' continued failures, Big Mom decided to disown and replace him with a new Homie named Hera.
Marilyn is an old lady that lives in Skypiea. She was Miss Skypiea forty-two years ago.
N/A
Kelly Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Bobby Funk's older brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Gazelleman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. After being tamed by Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
George Mach is a member of the Foxy Pirates. He fought Mountain Ricky before the third round of the Davy Back Fight.

affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Franky Family (former); Tom's Workers (former); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: "Iron Man" Franky is the shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the crew's eighth member and the seventh to join, doing so at the end of the Post-Enies Lobby Arc.
Genzo is the sheriff of Cocoyasi Village. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Arlong Park Arc.

"Massacre Soldier" Killer is a pirate from the South Blue and a combatant of the Kid Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". After the timeskip, his bounty has been raised from 162,000,000 to 200,000,000.

Shimotsuki Kozaburo was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a swordsmith who crafted the Great Grade Blades, Wado Ichimonji and Enma. He was born in Wano Country, but illegally departed from there 55 years ago and eventually settled down in what became Shimotsuki Village in the East Blue. There, he fathered a son named Koushirou, making him the grandfather of Koushirou's daughter Kuina.

Shimotsuki Ushimaru was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and the last daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country. He ruled until the takeover of Kurozumi Orochi as shogun 20 years ago. He was a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma, the younger brother of Shimotsuki Furiko, and the great-uncle of Roronoa Zoro.

Shimotsuki Yasuie, also known as "Yasu the Hedgehog", Tonoyasu, or just Yasu (ヤス, Yasu?), was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and a taikomochi who lived in Ebisu Town near the capital of Wano Country. He was the adoptive father of Toko.

affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates; Buggy's Delivery (former); Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Gerd is a giant from Elbaf and the doctor of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. She was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.
Gig is a member of the Kid Pirates.
Giberson, known as "The Concealer", is a veteran warehouseman and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Vinsmoke Family (former); Baratie (resigned); Germa Kingdom (defected); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: "Black Leg" Sanji, born as Vinsmoke Sanji, is the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the fifth member of the crew and the fourth to join, doing so at the end of the Baratie Arc.
Sky Boss Gedatsu was one of Enel's priests who punished criminals with the Ordeal of Swamp during Enel's reign.

Sora is a fictional character and the main protagonist of the comic Sora, Warrior of the Sea. The character's exploits are based on the actions of Marine heroes, in order to serve as Marine propaganda.
N/A

affiliations: Kozuki Family; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance; Nine Red Scabbards
description: "Foxfire Kin'emon" is a samurai from the region of Kuri in Wano Country, a retainer of the Kozuki Family, the leader of the Nine Red Scabbards, the husband of Tsurujo, and a former thug. He was born 56 years before the present day, but traveled 20 years forward in time when he was 36 years old.

Gem of the Border, better known by his alias Mr. 5, was formerly the lowest-ranked officer agent in Baroque Works along with his partner, Miss Valentine. He now works as a fireman at the new Spiders Cafe alongside most of his former colleagues.
N/A
Snakeman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.
Maria Napole is a singer and is considered the pride of Fish-Man Island.

affiliations: Red Hair Pirates; Four Emperors; Roger Pirates (former)
description: "Red-Haired" Shanks, commonly known as just "Red Hair", is the chief of the Red Hair Pirates and one of the Four Emperors that rule over the New World.
Gimlet was the infant son of Senor Pink and Russian.
Peepley Lulu is one of the five foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. His specialties as shipwright are pitch, block and tackle, and blacksmithing.
Muret was the doctor of the Bellamy Pirates.
N/A

Pekkori is the leader of Harahettania, the Land of Poverty, situated on Namakura Island in Paradise. He directed the ritual in which he and his people "summoned" Brook, though they were trying to summon the devil.
Spartan is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who was going to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, before being defeated by Luffy.

japanese_name: ゴーイング・メリー号
english_name: Going Merry (Uncut dub) Merry Go (VIZ, Edited dub)
description: The Going Merry was the first full-sized ship owned by the Straw Hat Pirates, a caravel that served as their main transportation through the East Blue, and the Grand Line up until Water 7. It was often affectionally referred to as simply Merry (メリー, Merī?) by the crew.
Julius is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
N/A
Sora is a mermaid and an employee at the Mermaid Cafe.
Edison, also designated as Punk-03 (PUNK-03パンク スリー, Panku-Surī?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "thinking".
Salome is Boa Hancock’s personal Snake Weapon.

Smiley, more commonly known as Slime (スライム, Suraimu?), was a pet of Caesar Clown. It was created by gathering and compressing the poisonous H2S gas that spread throughout Punk Hazard and using Vegapunk's process of Zoan devil fruit animation to bring it to life. It was kept in the Punk Hazard Burning Lands before being released.
devil_fruit_name: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl

description: Kotetsu was a swordsmith who crafted the cursed Great Grade sword Nidai Kitetsu. He is an ancestor of the present-day Kozuki Family in Wano Country, namely Sukiyaki, Oden, Momonosuke, and Hiyori.
Kotatsu is a member of the Spade Pirates.
Gonbe is known as Chimney's pet cat, although he is actually a rabbit.
The Decalvan Brothers are two infamous New World pirates who allied with Whitebeard.
Tamanegi is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Ninjin and Piiman, before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.
Jo is a former prisoner of Udon's prisoner mines.

affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)
description: Jigoku Benten is a kunoichi and a member of the Beasts Pirates. She previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Smoker the White Hunter is a Marine vice admiral and the Commander of the G-5 Marine base, following the treason of his former superior Vergo. He was first introduced as a captain in Loguetown, where he made it his mission to capture Luffy, and was later promoted to the rank of commodore, due to the events in the Arabasta Kingdom. Since his debut, he has been the superior of Tashigi, serving as her mentor as well.

affiliations: Arlong Pirates (former); Caribou Pirates (former); Fake Straw Hat Crew (former)
description: Momoo is a giant sea cow from the Grand Line, and the first Sea Beast seen in the series. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".
N/A

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom Scouting Unit; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Inhel is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.
The Forest Boss is a mandrill that was first introduced in Gedatsu's cover story.
Mr. Beans was a Baroque Works Millions agent stationed at Whisky Peak alongside his partner, Miss Catherina. He worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.
Motobaro is the pet bison of Duval. He is used by Duval as a steed, and can also swim on water.
Jizo is a samurai and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He was previously a member of the Mimawarigumi, which served as the police force of the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
Ganryu was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
Ganryu is a member of the Spade Pirates and a member of the Longarm Tribe.
Gatherine is a cafeteria worker at Enies Lobby.
Gatz is the announcer at the Corrida Colosseum.
Genrin is an old man who lives in Ebisu Town.
Mario is a dog that tore off the arm of a toy citizen of Dressrosa.

Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow, more commonly referred to as Kiku, is a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer for the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. She is also the younger sister of Izou and the daughter of the dancing school head of the Hanayanagi School (花柳流, Hanayanagi-ryū?) in Ringo.

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tonta Corps; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Maujii is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the SMILE Factory during the dwarves' rebellion.
N/A
N/A
Shanba is an inhabitant of Torino Kingdom. He was first seen at the time of Chopper's arrival.

Masked Deuce is an alias used by the first member of Ace's pirate crew, the Spade Pirates, usually referred to as just "Deuce" or "Deu". He abandoned his real name, which remains unknown, but is known to have come from a prominent East Blue family of medical professionals. Despite nominally being the head of the crew besides Ace, Deuce could struggle being respected by the crew, often relying on Skull and Mihar, the other ship's officers. Deuce also came to be referred to as "Doc" by at least Whitebeard after being integrated into the medical staff of the Whitebeard Pirates.
The Recycle-Wan is a mechanical dog-like creature that eats scraps and litter on Egghead.
Inuppe was a Wild Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria who was eventually assigned to guard Hogback.
"Rebar" Smooge is an ex-prisoner, who was a centaur henchman for Caesar Clown.
Rabbitman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.
Mukkashimi Tower is a spectator at the Corrida Colosseum.
Komane is the deposed princess of the Lulusia Kingdom, being the daughter of the former king Seki.
N/A

Impel Down, also known as the Underwater Prison (海底監獄, Kaitei Kangoku?) or the Great Prison (大監獄, Dai Kangoku?), is a government-controlled stronghold in Paradise together with Marine Headquarters and Enies Lobby. It is the World Government's maximum-security prison for the most dangerous criminals and pirates. It is located underwater in the middle of the Calm Belt and part of the Tarai Current.
N/A

affiliations: Thriller Bark Pirates (Mysterious Four); Seven Warlords of the Sea (former); Gecko Pirates (former)
description: Gecko Moria is the captain of the Thriller Bark Pirates and a former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea who resides on Thriller Bark, the largest ship in the world. His bounty is 320,000,000, which was frozen until he lost his Warlord position.
Ratel is a Marine captain who led an invasion of Sphinx during Marco's absence.
First Lieutenant Spacey is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Tsukimi.

Mr. 9 is the code name of a former Frontier Agent and bounty hunter of Baroque Works, and Miss Wednesday's former assigned partner during her infiltration. Due to his actions, he is one of the main antagonists of the Reverse Mountain Arc, and a supporting antihero in the Whisky Peak Arc. He is currently married to Miss Monday.
Reuder is a reporter who witnessed and reported on the events of the Summit War of Marineford from Sabaody Archipelago.
Jibuemon is a former retainer from Kibi serving under the Kozuki Shogunate. As a hatamoto, he directly served under the former shogun, Kozuki Sukiyaki.

affiliations: Gyro Pirates, New Fish-Man Pirates (ruse, former)
description: N/A
Nangi is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "seven".
Peppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the middle triplet brother of Heppoko and Poppoko.
Mummy is a sorcerer who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Peterman is the head of a kidnapping gang called the Hound Pets, located in Sabaody Archipelago, and a minor antagonist of the Sabaody Archipelago Arc.
Pound is Big Mom's 25th ex-husband and the father of Charlotte Chiffon and Charlotte Lola. He is also the grandfather of Capone Pez and father-in-law of Capone Bege and Gotti.
"Town-Collapser" Drophy, better known by her alias Miss Merry Christmas, is a former officer agent partnered with Mr. 4.
Jigoro of the Wind was a General Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria who was eventually assigned to guard Hogback. As he had Zoro's shadow, he was a user of Three Sword Style.

Richie is Mohji's pet lion and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance as part of Buggy Pirates. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and is currently a member of Cross Guild. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".
Jean Ango, also known as Jean the Bandit, is a bounty hunter. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
Kaya is a young woman who lives in the largest mansion in Syrup Village on the Gecko Islands. She is a close friend of Usopp and is currently studying to become a doctor.
Katsuzo was a citizen of Wano Country. He died 41 years before the present day, and his cremated body was used by Kozuki Oden to cook a pot of oden.

Prometheus the Sun is a sun homie that Big Mom summons from her right hand. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Napoleon and Hera, and formerly Zeus.
Itomimizu is the Foxy Pirates' game official and serves as the announcer and commentator of the Davy Back Fight events. He rides on a very large bird named Chuchun.
Jero is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
O-Saki is a resident of Ebisu Town.
S-Snake is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Boa Hancock.

affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom; Suna Suna Clan (formerly); Rebel Army (formerly)
description: Kebi was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi, Koza and Okame.

affiliations: Dracule Mihawk; Thriller Bark Pirates (Mysterious Four)
description: "Ghost Princess" Perona is the former commander of the Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. She was one of the Mysterious Four and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga.
Mummy Mee is one of the houseparents, alongside Daddy Dee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.

japanese_name: シャーロット・ドルチェ シャーロット・ドラジェ
english_name: Charlotte Dolce and Dragée (Viz); Charlotte Dolce and Dragee (WT100)
description: N/A
Mash is a giant octopus that appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.
N/A
Spandam is the former chief of CP9 and CP5. He is the son of Spandine, who was also his predecessor as the chief of CP9. He currently serves under CP0.
N/A
Yu is a little girl who accidentally bumped into Smoker and got ice cream on his uniform.
Natto was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi, Koza, Okame, and Kebi.

Gin the "Man-Demon" is a pirate and the Combat Commander (戦闘総隊長, Sentō sōtaichō?) of the Krieg Pirates. He is initially introduced as a mere combatant of Krieg before his actual rank and abilities are made clear.

Kawamatsu the Kappa is a Japanese puffer fish-man who is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler. As a child, he was shipwrecked in Wano and orphaned soon afterwards. After Kozuki Oden rescued him from an attempted lynching, he went on to serve as one of Oden's Nine Red Scabbards until Oden's death 20 years ago.

Hyogoro of the Flower is the former yakuza boss of the Flower Capital and the most famous yakuza in Wano Country during the Kozuki Family's reign. During Kurozumi Orochi's reign, he was imprisoned in Udon's prisoner mines until he was freed by Monkey D. Luffy. As a prisoner, he was known as Grandpa Hyo (ヒョウじい, Hyō-jii?).

english_name: Moocy (VIZ Media, FUNimation dub); Usy (FUNimation simulcast); Bullcy (FUNimation subs)
description: "Brutal Bull" Ucy is a fighting bull (闘牛, Tōgyū?) that regularly competed as a gladiator in Dressrosa's Corrida Colosseum, where he was befriended (and named) by Monkey D. Luffy.
Ushiano is a cattle Mink and the deputy commander of the West Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Morley.
N/A
Thatch was the 4th division commander as well as the culinary chef of the Whitebeard Pirates. He was murdered by Marshall D. Teach prior to the main storyline.

Miss Friday is a vulture and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies (13日の金曜日アンラッキーズ, Anrakkīzu?) along with Mr. 13. They were a team that served as messengers for Mr. 0 and were also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions. She is classified as Type D creatures, "Small Savage".
Uhho-kun is a gorilla.
Dr. Kureha is an elderly doctor who works on Drum Island. She is referred to as "witch" by some people.
Tibany is an okama from Momoiro Island. He and the other okama chased after Sanji and attempted to convert him into an okama. In the anime, he was called Elizabeth (エリザベス, Erizabesu?).

affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Straw Hat Grand Fleet (Tontatta Pirates)
description: "Warrior" Leo is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and the leader of the "Tonta Corps " (トンタ兵長, Tonta-heichō?), which was later reformed as a pirate crew now known as the Tontatta Pirates, with Leo now acting as the captain. He is the captain of the fifth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
Hera is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum that competed for the Mera Mera no Mi.

japanese_name: サリー・ナントカネット
description: Sarie Nantokanette is the queen of Goa Kingdom and Sterry's wife.
N/A
Izou was the former 16th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and prior to this, a retainer of the Wano Country daimyo Kozuki Oden. He was the older brother of fellow retainer Kikunojo.
Usakkov is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5. He is one of Emporio Ivankov's dancers.
Yamenahare is a citizen of Pucci and the manservant to Marumieta, the daughter of Pucci's mayor, Bimine.
Roronoa Arashi was the son of Shimotsuki Furiko and Roronoa Pinzoro making him a member of the Shimotsuki Family. He is the father of Roronoa Zoro and the husband of Tera.
Erik is a member of the Rebel Army in Arabasta led by Koza. He is from Suiren, a town that had been completely dried out.

Rebecca is the daughter of Scarlett and Kyros, the niece of Viola and the granddaughter of Riku Doldo III. She is the former crown princess of Dressrosa, who forfeited her title to live with her father and currently serves as a lady-in-waiting to her aunt, Viola.
Uwattsura is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a chief guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.
Mari is the king of Chaco Kingdom (チャコ王国, Chako Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
Zodia is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
Prince Grus is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine Base G-14 and a member of SWORD. His fellow SWORD members also refer to Grus by the title of Prince (王子, Ōji?) which differs from his surname.

japanese_name: ネフェルタリ・コブラ
english_name: Nefeltari Cobra (VIZ, Movie 8); Nefertari Cobra (Funimation); Nefeltari Nebra (4Kids)
description: Nefertari Cobra was the 12th king of the Arabasta Kingdom, the former patriarch of Nefertari Family, husband of the late Nefertari Titi and father of Nefertari Vivi. He was a descendant of Nefertari D. Lili, one of the First Twenty monarchs who founded the World Government, and secretly bore her initial D. in his name.

affiliations: Little Pirates; Subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates
description: Little Oars Jr. (also referred to as Oars III on his flag) is the captain of the Little Pirates, a descendant of Oars, and a former subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is among the several New World pirates that aided the Whitebeard Pirates in saving Ace from execution by the World Government.

affiliations: Big Mom Pirates (defected); Straw Hat Pirates
description: Zeus the Thundercloud is a homie that is fused with Nami's Sorcery Clima-Tact. Before merging with the Clima-Tact, he was owned by Big Mom, who would summon him from her left hand. Due to being made from a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, he is more powerful than most homies.
Tera was the daughter of a bandit from the East Blue. She is the mother of Roronoa Zoro, as well as the wife of Roronoa Arashi.
Zucca is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
Zeo is a Japanese wobbegong fish-man and the self-proclaimed "Noble of the Fish-Man District". He was an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.

debut: Chapter 1055 (flashback); One Piece Film: Red; Episode 1029
description: Uta is a world-famous singer or "diva" (歌姫, Utahime?) and the adopted daughter of the Emperor Red-Haired Shanks who was also a musician in his crew until he left her while she was still a child. She was left on the island of Elegia with Gordon, who became her foster parent and supported her dream of starting a "New Era" and later her desire to achieve this dream through a broadcasted, world-wide concert held on Elegia.
N/A
Zeff is the head chef and owner of Baratie. Before that, he was the captain of the Cook Pirates (in which he was known as "Red-Leg") until his crew was annihilated in a storm.

japanese_name: トラファルガー・ラミ
description: Trafalgar Lami was Trafalgar D. Water Law's younger sister from the town of Flevance.
Broken Hat Tsunagoro is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Hakumai region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.
N/A
Tokijiro is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints to Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.
The Sphinx is a giant sphinx that serves as the boss of Impel Down's Level 2, Beast Hell.
Captain Very Good is one of the Marines who helped to attack the Straw Hat Pirates during the Buster Call at Enies Lobby.
Tonjit is an elderly nomad belonging to a tribe that lives on Long Ring Long Land.
Warashi is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.
Tokikake, better known by his alias Chaton, is a Marine vice admiral.
Ran is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)
description: Raijin is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

japanese_name: ビクトリア･シンドリー
description: Victoria Cindry was once a famous stage actress who died after falling off the stage twelve years ago. Having been infatuated with her, Dr. Hogback stole her corpse in order to make her his own personal zombie servant with the aid of Gecko Moria's powers.

affiliations: Happo Navy; Chinjao Family; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Sai, also known as Don Sai, is a member of the Chinjao Family and the 13th leader of the Happo Navy, as well as the captain of the third ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is also a martial artist who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met Monkey D. Luffy, whom he eventually pledged his loyalty to. He is now married to Baby 5, a former officer of the Donquixote Pirates who defected due to falling in love with him.

Kashigami was a giant snake that lived on Jaya four centuries ago. It was worshiped by the Shandia as a god until it was slain by Mont Blanc Noland. It is the grandparent of Nola, who lives on the land in the present day.
Wallace is a weedy stingfish fish-man and a member of the Spade Pirates.
Pudding Pudding was a Marine commodore in the 77th Branch of the Marines.

english_name: Nefeltari Vivi (VIZ, 4Kids, Funimation subs, Odex, Movie 8 dub); Vivi Nefertari (Funimation dub); Nefertari Vivi (Unlimited Adventure)
affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom (Nefertari Family); Straw Hat Pirates (former, temporary); Baroque Works (double agent); Suna Suna Clan (former)
description: Nefertari Vivi is the princess of the Arabasta Kingdom. She is the daughter of Nefertari Cobra and Titi, and along with the rest of her family, she bears the initial D. in her name. During her childhood, Vivi was part of the Suna Suna Clan, being the vice-leader of the group led by her friend Koza.
Wany is Wanda's crocodile-boar steed.
Wanyudo is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, serving as Black Maria's weapon.

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom (Inuarashi Musketeer Squad); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance
description: Pastor Yomo is a sheep mink and one of Inuarashi's Musketeers.
N/A

Vasco Shot, monikered "Heavy Drinker", is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as the captain of the Eighth Ship. He was originally one of several legendary criminals given a life sentence on Impel Down's Level 6, before being freed by Blackbeard and joining him.
"Monster Gun" Vito is a member of the Fire Tank Pirates, working as the crew's advisor.
Snake-Eyes Yatappe is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Kibi region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance(disbanded)
description: Wanda is a canine mink of the Warrior Beast Tribe and the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad and was previously a Kingsbird to both Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.

japanese_name: マーシャル・Dディー・ティーチ
english_name: Marshall D. Teech (VIZ, Funimation subs, edited dub); Marshall D. Teach (Funimation uncut dub)
affiliations: Blackbeard Pirates; Four Emperors; Seven Warlords of the Sea (former); Whitebeard Pirates 2nd Division (defected)
description: Marshall D. Teach, most commonly referred to by his epithet "Blackbeard", is the captain-turned-admiral of the Blackbeard Pirates, and one of the Four Emperors that rule over the New World. He is also the only known person in history to wield the powers of two Devil Fruits.
Yokan is a doctor assigned to treat the injured at sumo matches in Bakura Town.

japanese_name: ヴィンスモーク・ヨンジ
description: Vinsmoke Yonji, also known as "Winch Green", is the fourth son and youngest child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.
"Vista of the Flower Swords" is the former 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is one of the most prominent members of his crew.
N/A
Wanze is an agent of CP7 and a cook, specializing in making ramen noodles.
Vander Decken was the first captain of the Flying Dutchman.
Yokozuna is a Sumo Frog that Tom's Workers kept as a pet, friend and mascot up until Tom's execution.

Sakazuki, formerly known by his Admiral alias Akainu, is the current Fleet Admiral of the Marines, succeeding the previous Fleet Admiral, Sengoku. During the first half of the series, he was one of the three Admirals, and was the last one out of the three to debut. Upon becoming the Fleet Admiral, one of Sakazuki's first decisions was to relocate Marine Headquarters into the New World in preparation for the New Pirate Age.
Mock Town is a port town on the western coast of Jaya. It is inhabited mostly by pirates, despite it looking like a resort.
Waruno Furishiro is a man who manages weapon production orders on behalf of Kurozumi Orochi in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.

affiliations: Evil Black Drum Kingdom; Drum Kingdom (former); Bliking Pirates (disbanded)
description: "Tin-Plate" Wapol is the former monarch of the Drum Kingdom. He became a pirate after fleeing from his country when Blackbeard and his crew attacked Drum Island. After his defeat by the Straw Hat Pirates, he became the head of his own toy enterprise and married Kinderella. Two years later, he was given his own kingdom by the World Nobles and now reigns as the king of the Black Drum Kingdom. After witnessing Nefertari Cobra being assassinated by Imu and the Five Elders at the latest Levely, Wapol became a fugitive when he fled and took refuge with Morgans in his news balloon along with Vivi.
A scientist is an individual who uses their knowledge and expertise to help engineer new creations, either to serve the world or themselves.
Wheel is the prince of South Fire Kingdom. He accompanied his father Jeep to the Levely.
Wellington is a North Blue pirate from around fourteen to sixteen years ago.
Uni is a member of the Heart Pirates.

affiliations: Tontatta Tribe Scouting UnitStraw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Wicca is a female dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom beneath Green Bit. She, along with other members of her kind often pose as Dressrosa's fairies and take their "offerings". She is a member of the Tontatta Pirates, the 5th Division of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
Yazaemon is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

King Neptune is a coelacanth merman and the king of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island. He is also the current patriarch of the Neptune Family, father of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi, and the husband of the late Queen Otohime.
Unforgivable Mask is a hidden One Piece character, much like Pandaman. He is, in fact, Pandaman's rival.
Ultraking was the assistant-manager of Rain Dinners in Rainbase during the Arabasta Arc.
"Deep Ocean Current" Umit is a shipping magnate and one of the emperors of the Underworld.
N/A
Tori is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
Seaman Recruit Ukkari is a Marine who serves at the Shells Town Marine base.
N/A
Nero the Sea Weasel was the newest agent of CP9. He was first introduced on the Puffing Tom, where he helped to escort Nico Robin to Enies Lobby.

japanese_name: トップマン・ウォーキュリー聖
description: Saint Topman Warcury is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Justice.
N/A
Tsurue Monnosuke is the machi-bugyō of the Flower Capital.
York, also designated as Punk-06 (PUNK-06パンク シックス, Panku-Shikkusu?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "greed".
Yosaku along with Johnny are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.
"Calico" Yorki was the captain of the Rumbar Pirates who brought Laboon to Reverse Mountain fifty years ago from West Blue.
Who's-Who, also known as Who of the Droplets, is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates.
devil_fruit_name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger

description: Tristan is a squirrel mink and one of Inuarashi's subjects.
Wire is a member of the Kid Pirates.
Woop Slap is the mayor of Monkey D. Luffy's hometown, Foosha Village.
Tritobu is the prince of Nagagutsu Kingdom. He accompanied his father Furrari to the Levely.
Turco was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who masqueraded as Franky.
Urashima is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler of Wano Country's Flower Capital. He is also of samurai class, thus giving him an elevated social status, and a minor antagonist of Wano Country Arc.

english_name: Wyper (4Kids, Viz, FUNimation); Wyler (4Kids; FUNimation edited dub)
description: "Berserker" Wyper is the former leader of the Shandia warriors that fought to take Upper Yard back from Enel. He is the direct descendant of Kalgara.
Unigaro was a Wild Zombie who lived on Thriller Bark.

japanese_name: バンダー・デッケン九世
affiliations: Flying Pirates; Ally of the New Fish-Man Pirates (former)
description: Vander Decken IX is the captain of the Flying Pirates on their ship, the Flying Dutchman, and the eighth descendant of the original Vander Decken of legend. He is a Japanese bullhead shark fish-man and the secondary antagonist of the Fish-Man Island Arc.
Mr. Yoshimoto is the owner of the restaurant Spice Bean.
Yui was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
Tsugaru Umi is a woman who trained Nico Robin to perform as a geisha. She lives in the Flower Capital of the Wano Country.
Yurikah is the captain of the Tulip Pirates that attacked Mirrorball Island in Jango's cover story.
Yama is a Birkan and the commander of the Divine Soldiers under Enel. He is a supporting antagonist during the Skypiea Arc.
"Large Monk" Wadatsumi is a giant tiger blowfish fish-man and a member of the Sun Pirates. He was formerly a member of the Flying Pirates under captain Vander Decken IX before they were defeated.
Viola is the second daughter of the Riku Family and the current crown princess of Dressrosa after her niece Rebecca abdicated her position. She is the younger sister of the late Scarlett.
Zadie was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

english_name: Van Augur (VIZ) Van Ogre (Formerly VIZ, Edited Funimation) Van Auger (Uncut Funimation)
description: Van Augur, nicknamed "The Supersonic", is the sniper of the Blackbeard Pirates, as well as one of the Ten Titanic Captains, as the captain of the Third Ship.

affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom; Nefertari Family; World Government
description: Nefertari D. Lili was the queen of the Arabasta Kingdom during the time of the Void Century, being one of the twenty monarchs credited with the founding of the World Government. Unlike the other nineteen monarchs, Lili chose not to become a World Noble and move to Mary Geoise, but before she could return to her home country, she mysteriously vanished. Aside from that, little is known about her except that she had a younger brother who succeeded her as ruler of Arabasta.

Urouge, nicknamed the Mad Monk, is a pirate hailing from a sky island and captain of the Fallen Monk Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the "Worst Generation", and prior to the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 108,000,000.
Captain Nezumi is a Marine captain of the 16th Branch in the East Blue. Highly corrupt, he covered up the vast majority of Arlong's actions in the Conomi Islands in exchange for bribe money.

"Poison Spider" Zala, better known by her alias Miss Doublefinger, was the second highest ranking female officer agent in the secret organization known as Baroque Works. As an officer agent, she was partnered with Mr. 1. She also used the alias of Paula while she acted as the owner of Spiders Cafe in Arabasta.

Nashi is the king of Ringo Kingdom (リンゴ王国, Ringo Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
Ukon is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
Sapi is a fish salesman from Loguetown who sold Sanji the blue-finned elephant tuna.

Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past.
S-Hawk is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Dracule Mihawk.
"Demon Bamboo" Vergo was one of the four elite officers and the first to occupy the Heart seat of the Donquixote Pirates under the codename Corazon.
Johnny along with Yosaku are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.

Sanjuan Wolf is an enormous giant, known as "Colossal Battleship" for his size, and was originally one of the legendary criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious they had to effectively be erased from history itself. He was initially mentioned briefly by Emporio Ivankov.

affiliations: Marines; Drake Pirates; Beasts Pirates (Tobiroppo, former); Barrels Pirates (defected); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: "Red Flag" X Drake (pronounced as "Diez Drake") is the captain of the Marine Secret Special Unit SWORD. In order to go undercover as a pirate, he publicly defected from his position as rear admiral and founded the Drake Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the "Worst Generation", and before the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 222,000,000.

affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Usopp Pirates (disbanded); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
description: "God" Usopp is the sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the fourth member of the crew and the third to join, doing so at the end of the Syrup Village Arc. Although he left the crew during the Water 7 Arc, he rejoined at the end of the Post-Enies Lobby Arc.
